name: Back To Life 3
description: The journey of the small beneficial cell reaches its final chapter!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP/Vista/7 Processor: Intel Pentium 1.6 GHz or equivalent Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 3D graphics card DirectX Â® compatible DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 100 MB available space Sound Card: Any Windows compatible sound device

reviews.review_text: An alright puzzle game for it's price, but gets boring quite quickly. Controls could be better too.
